definitions.definition: To make a gesture or gestures.
examples: My dad told me never to gesture with my hands when I talk.
Never gesture at someone using your middle finger: it may be perceived as an insult.

definitions.definition: To express (something) by a gesture or gestures.
To accompany or illustrate with gesture or action.
To express or signal (to someone) by a gesture or gestures (to do something, go somewhere, etc).

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To make a gesture or gestures.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To express (something) by a gesture or gestures.
( transitive ) To accompany or illustrate with gesture or action.
( transitive ) To express or signal (to someone) by a gesture or gestures (to do something, go somewhere, etc).
